verses.verse: <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H7462>feeds<s%> on <S%H7307>wind,<s%> And <S%H7291>pursues<s%> the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H6921>wind<s%> <S%H3605>continually<s%><S%H3117>;<s%> He <S%H7235>multiplies<s%> <S%H3577>lies<s%> and <S%H7701>violence.<s%> Moreover, he <S%H3772>makes<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H804>Assyria,<s%> And <S%H8081>oil<s%> is <S%H2986>carried<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> also has a <S%H7379>dispute<s%> with <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> And will <S%H6485>punish<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> according to his <S%H1870>ways;<s%> He will <S%H7725>repay<s%> him according to his <S%H4611>deeds.<s%>
In the <S%H990>womb<s%> he <S%H6117>took<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%> by the <S%H6117>heel,<s%> And in his <S%H202>maturity<s%> he <S%H8280>contended<s%> with <S%H430>God.<s%>

Yes, he <S%H8280>wrestled<s%> with the <S%H4397>angel<s%> and <S%H3201>prevailed;<s%> He <S%H1058>wept<s%> and <S%H2603>sought<s%> His <S%H2603>favor.<s%> He <S%H4672>found<s%> Him at <S%H1008>Bethel,<s%> And <S%H8033>there<s%> He <S%H1696>spoke<s%> with us,
Even the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts;<s%> The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is His <S%H2143>name.<s%>
Therefore, <S%H7725>return<s%> to your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H8104>Observe<s%> <S%H2617>kindness<s%> and <S%H4941>justice,<s%> And <S%H6960>wait<s%> for your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H8548>continually.<s%>
A <S%H9212>merchant,<s%> in whose <S%H3027>hands<s%> are <S%H4820>false<s%> <S%H3976>balances,<s%> He <S%H157>loves<s%> to <S%H6231>oppress.<s%>

And <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H389>"Surely<s%> I have <S%H6238>become<s%> <S%H6238>rich,<s%> I have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H202>wealth<s%> for myself; In <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H3018>labors<s%> they will <S%H4672>find<s%> in me <S%H3808>No<s%> <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> [would be] <S%H2399>sin.<s%>"

But I [have been] the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H4480>since<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> I will make you <S%H3427>live<s%> in <S%H168>tents<s%> <S%H5750>again,<s%> As in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H4150>appointed<s%> <S%H4150>festival.<s%>

I have also <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> And I <S%H7235>gave<s%> <S%H7235>numerous<s%> <S%H2377>visions;<s%> And <S%H3027>through<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> I <S%H1819>gave<s%> <S%H1819>parables.<s%>

Is there <S%H205>iniquity<s%> [in] <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>? <S%H389>Surely<s%> they are <S%H7723>worthless.<s%> In <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%> they <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> <S%H7794>bulls,<s%> <S%H1571>Yes,<s%> their <S%H4196>altars<s%> are like the <S%H1530>stone<s%> <S%H1530>heaps<s%> <S%H5921>Beside<s%> the <S%H8525>furrows<s%> of the <S%H9583>field.<s%>

Now <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H1272>fled<s%> to the <S%H7704>land<s%> of <S%H758>Aram,<s%> And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5647>worked<s%> for a <S%H802>wife,<s%> And for a <S%H802>wife<s%> he <S%H8104>kept<s%> [sheep.]
But by a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5927>brought<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> And by a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> he was <S%H8104>kept.<s%>

<S%H669>Ephraim<s%> has <S%H3707>provoked<s%> to <S%H8563>bitter<s%> <S%H3707>anger;<s%> So his <S%H136>Lord<s%> will <S%H5203>leave<s%> his <S%H1818>bloodguilt<s%> on him, And <S%H7725>bring<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> his <S%H2781>reproach<s%> to him.
